name: Wissen Heroes
description:
Recruit Heroes for your team and fight strategically.


Wissen Heroes is a turn-based multiplayer strategy game set in a fantasy universe and themed as a classic board game.

Collect the best Heroes, choose their skills carefully, equip them with the best combination of relics, and be smart to anticipate your opponent's actions.

You must choose your actions in secret and they will be revealed simultaneously, shaping an innovative strategic combat experience.

Fun and challenging


Seemingly simple rules, quick matches, and many possibilities for unique and diverse gameplay styles.

Deeply strategic


From positioning to the attack, it is possible at any time to create situations that will give you advantage or tactically control over the battle situations.

Fair and competitive


A game which you won't have to pay in order to win, your skills will always be the most important factor.
